headline: Berkshire Hathaway vs. Travelers: Which Insurer Offers Better Return?
summary: TRV outpaces BRK.B in terms of return on equity and stock gains; however, both insurers face climate risks and rising tech-driven M&A activity.

raw.headline: Berkshire Hathaway vs. Travelers: Which Insurer Offers Better Return?
raw.summary: TRV outpaces BRK.B in terms of return on equity and stock gains; however, both insurers face climate risks and rising tech-driven M&A activity.

headline: WTW appoints Cecelia Lockner as Strategic Client Advisor to AAIS team in North America
summary: NEW YORK, July 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Willis, a WTW business (NASDAQ: WTW), has announced the appointment of Cecelia Lockner as Senior Director, Strategic Client Advisor within the North America Alternative Asset Insurance Solutions (AAIS) vertical. Lockner’s appointment underscores Willis’ commitment to delivering forward-thinking insurance solutions grounded in deep industry expertise with a sharp focus on client outcomes. headline: Pay raises plateau: Companies hold steady on salary budgets for 2026
summary: Despite limited pay growth, employee turnover remains low.

raw.headline: Pay raises plateau: Companies hold steady on salary budgets for 2026
raw.summary: Despite limited pay growth, employee turnover remains low.

headline: Employers report unchanged salary budgets, with increases flat at 3.5%
summary: “Organizations are being more deliberate about how they allocate pay, where they focus investment and what outcomes they expect to drive,” a WTW director said.

raw.headline: Employers report unchanged salary budgets, with increases flat at 3.5%

headline: WTW’s Willis appoints Adrian Cousins as Head of London Market Claims
summary: LONDON, July 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Willis, a WTW business, (NASDAQ: WTW), today announced the appointment of Adrian Cousins as Head of London Market Claims. In this new role, Cousins will be responsible for overseeing and implementing key aspects of Willis’ global claims strategy, including strategic engagement with London market insurers, reinsurers, adjusters and law firms.
